ComicInfo.Summary:
More excitement, drama, and humor by the best comics creators from overseas! This issue features a cover by Geof Darrow and includes the continuations of Rork by Andreas, Adele & the Beast by Jacques Tardi, Fever in Urbicand by Peeters and Schuiten and The Lone Sloane by Phillipe Druillet--as well as Oscar Hellian by John Bolton, and works by Cossu, Brian Bolland, and Darrow!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-2/4000-31583/
